=== About Me ===

<nowiki>[[File:worellana.jpg]]</nowiki>

Hi, My name is Williams Orellana, I'm from San Miguel El Salvador, I'm part of the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntusv.org/|Salvadorean Ubuntu  Community]]</nowiki>. I started using GNU/Linux with Knopix long time ago, and after trying Mandrake and Debian, now I'm using Ubuntu since Hardy Heron. 

=== My Goals ===

* Become a MOTU.
* Keep helping to Ubuntu community.
* Contribute in the development of Ubuntu.
* Develop software for GNU/Linux Operating Systems.
